title: The Best Early Black Friday Deals on Air Fryers, Cookware, and More
description: It’s not even the holidays yet, but the Black Friday savings have already begun! There’s nothing I love more than finding a great deal on one of my favorite cooking products and sharing it with you to help you save a little. author: Gina
excerpt: I've rounded up the best early Black Friday deals from my favorite brands, like Staub, Ninja, Our Place, and more!
text: This post may contain affiliate links. Read my disclosure policy.Credit: Walmart It’s not even the holidays yet, but the Black Friday savings have already begun! There’s nothing I love more than finding a great deal on one of my favorite cooking products and sharing it with you to help you save a little. I’ve already rounded up some of my favorite sales happening and found early Black Friday deals on everything from one of my favorite nonstick pans to a Dutch oven for making sourdough bread!  I’ll continue to update this post with more deals as I find them, but if you see something you love, I recommend getting it at this great price before it sells out or the sale ends. Happy shopping! My 5 Favorite Early Black Friday Deals 1. Vitamix 6500 Blender Credit: Walmart I love my Vitamix blender, which is powerful enough to make the smoothest smoothies, creamy soups, and even nut butters! They are pretty pricey, so I recommend getting one on sale. This model is nearly $200 off at Walmart and a great time to buy. 2. Skinnytaste Simple Credit: Amazon Anytime my cookbooks are on sale I love to share them with you guys! Currently, you can both my newest cookbook, Skinnytaste Simple, and Skinnytaste One and Done on sale. Get Skinnytaste Simple: Get Skinnytaste One and Done: 3. COSORI Air Fryer 9-in-1 Black Friday always brings a ton of air fryer deals, and this one is large enough for families. The digital display makes it easy to set the temperature and keep and eye on your food. It’s $32 off right now, too! 4. Pyrex 3-Cup Rectangle Food Storage Container Sales are some of the best times to snag some new food storage containers, and I love these ones from Pyrex. The glass containers are the perfect size for meal prep and you’ll get 6 containers in this bundle. 5. Carote Nonstick Pots and Pans Set I get asked about nontoxic pan recommendations often, and this affordable set is on sale. It’s made of a nonstick granite material that is easy to clean. The set comes with two frying pans, two saucepans, a saute pan, and a steamer for most of your cooking needs. Early Black Friday Cooking Deals I Love Credit: Williams Sonoma Always Pan 2.0 – $95 at Our Place (Originally $150): I love this nonstick pan and it’s at it’s lowest price I’ve seen as part of these early Black Friday deals. Etekcity Food Kitchen Scale – $10.99 at Amazon (Originally $13.99): This is great for measuring ingredients and portioning out foods. THERMOS Vacuum-Insulated Food Jar ThermoPro Digital Meat Thermometer – $10.99 at Amazon (Originally $14.99): Love this thermometer for grilling and making Thanksgiving turkey! Braun Portable Immersion Hand Blender – $52.46 at Amazon (Originally $69.95): This is useful for blending soups and whisking. Ninja CREAMi Ice Cream Maker – $179.99 at Amazon $229.99): This would make for a great gift this year! Breville the Compact Smart Oven – $149.99 at Amazon (Originally $189.95) Cshidworld Expandable Lunch Bag – $14.99 at Walmart (Originally $98.99): Great for school or work. Staub 7-Quart Round Dutch Oven – $299.95 at Williams Sonoma (Originally $470): This size is good for big batches of soups. Lodge Cast Iron Dutch Oven – $44.84 at Walmart (Originally $49.88): An affordable Dutch oven for bread baking. Crock-Pot MultiMeal Multicooker – $159.99 at Walmart (Originally $209.99): I’m loving slow cooked meals this cold season, and this one allows for two at once! Nespresso Vertuo Pop+ Coffee and Espresso Maker – $99 at Amazon (Originally $129.95): I love my Nespresso and this white color is so pretty! GreenPan Paris Pro Ceramic Non-Stick Cookware Set – $169.99 at Walmart (Originally $197.44); These nontoxic pans are super popular. Stainless Steel Cutting Board – $18.39 at Amazon with coupon (Originally $22.99): These are a great alternative to plastic cutting boards. Simple Modern 30-Ounce Tumbler – $19.98 at Walmart (Originally $24.98): I love this style of tumbler! Mueller Pro-Series Vegetable Chopper – $24.87 at Amazon (Originally $59.95): This will speed up vegetable prep. PriorityChef Large Potato Ricer – $19.93 at Amazon (Originally $32.99): This makes the creamiest mashed potatoes! Zwilling Four Star Eco Paring Knife – $29.95 at Williams Sonoma (Originally $59.95) Joseph Joseph PrecisionPin – $14.99 at Walmart (Originally $19.99): This has different settings for rolling the perfect thickness.  Staub Cast Iron Frying Pan – $99.99 at Zwilling (Originally $189.99): Love this pan! Other Early Black Friday Sales at Retailers I Love Target: Save up to 50% off holiday decor, including artificial trees and matching pajamas. Williams Sonoma: Thanksgiving cooking must-haves from amazing brands like Staub, Le Creuset, and All-Clad are currently on sale at Williams Sonoma. The Home Depot: Snag deals on everything from large home appliances to Christmas trees and tools.  Walmart: Tech, toys, cooking gear, and so much more are on sale at Walmart’s early Black Friday savings event. Cozy Earth Black Friday Sale: Get up to 35% off the coziest items, like joggers, pajamas, and throw blankets. RugsUSA Thankful Sale: Take up to 25% off a new rug to spruce up your space for hosting holiday dinners with code THANKS. I love this wool one! Wayfair: Furniture and holiday decor are up to 70% off at the Black Friday Sneak Peek sale. Prices were accurate at time of publishing. Categories:
html:
This post may contain affiliate links. Read my disclosure policy.

It’s not even the holidays yet, but the Black Friday savings have already begun! There’s nothing I love more than finding a great deal on one of my favorite cooking products and sharing it with you to help you save a little. I’ve already rounded up some of my favorite sales happening and found early Black Friday deals on everything from one of my favorite nonstick pans to a Dutch oven for making sourdough bread! 

I’ll continue to update this post with more deals as I find them, but if you see something you love, I recommend getting it at this great price before it sells out or the sale ends. Happy shopping!

My 5 Favorite Early Black Friday Deals

1. Vitamix 6500 Blender

I love my Vitamix blender, which is powerful enough to make the smoothest smoothies, creamy soups, and even nut butters! They are pretty pricey, so I recommend getting one on sale. This model is nearly $200 off at Walmart and a great time to buy.

2. Skinnytaste Simple

Anytime my cookbooks are on sale I love to share them with you guys! Currently, you can both my newest cookbook, Skinnytaste Simple, and Skinnytaste One and Done on sale.

Get Skinnytaste Simple:

Get Skinnytaste One and Done:

3. COSORI Air Fryer 9-in-1

Black Friday always brings a ton of air fryer deals, and this one is large enough for families. The digital display makes it easy to set the temperature and keep and eye on your food. It’s $32 off right now, too!

4. Pyrex 3-Cup Rectangle Food Storage Container

Sales are some of the best times to snag some new food storage containers, and I love these ones from Pyrex. The glass containers are the perfect size for meal prep and you’ll get 6 containers in this bundle.

5. Carote Nonstick Pots and Pans Set

I get asked about nontoxic pan recommendations often, and this affordable set is on sale. It’s made of a nonstick granite material that is easy to clean. The set comes with two frying pans, two saucepans, a saute pan, and a steamer for most of your cooking needs.

Early Black Friday Cooking Deals I Love

  • Always Pan 2.0 – $95 at Our Place (Originally $150): I love this nonstick pan and it’s at it’s lowest price I’ve seen as part of these early Black Friday deals.
  • Etekcity Food Kitchen Scale – $10.99 at Amazon (Originally $13.99): This is great for measuring ingredients and portioning out foods.
  • THERMOS Vacuum-Insulated Food Jar
  • ThermoPro Digital Meat Thermometer – $10.99 at Amazon (Originally $14.99): Love this thermometer for grilling and making Thanksgiving turkey!
  • Braun Portable Immersion Hand Blender – $52.46 at Amazon (Originally $69.95): This is useful for blending soups and whisking.
  • Ninja CREAMi Ice Cream Maker – $179.99 at Amazon $229.99): This would make for a great gift this year!
  • Breville the Compact Smart Oven – $149.99 at Amazon (Originally $189.95)
  • Cshidworld Expandable Lunch Bag – $14.99 at Walmart (Originally $98.99): Great for school or work.
  • Staub 7-Quart Round Dutch Oven – $299.95 at Williams Sonoma (Originally $470): This size is good for big batches of soups.
  • Lodge Cast Iron Dutch Oven – $44.84 at Walmart (Originally $49.88): An affordable Dutch oven for bread baking.
  • Crock-Pot MultiMeal Multicooker – $159.99 at Walmart (Originally $209.99): I’m loving slow cooked meals this cold season, and this one allows for two at once!
  • Nespresso Vertuo Pop+ Coffee and Espresso Maker – $99 at Amazon (Originally $129.95): I love my Nespresso and this white color is so pretty!
  • GreenPan Paris Pro Ceramic Non-Stick Cookware Set – $169.99 at Walmart (Originally $197.44); These nontoxic pans are super popular.
  • Stainless Steel Cutting Board – $18.39 at Amazon with coupon (Originally $22.99): These are a great alternative to plastic cutting boards.
  • Simple Modern 30-Ounce Tumbler – $19.98 at Walmart (Originally $24.98): I love this style of tumbler!
  • Mueller Pro-Series Vegetable Chopper – $24.87 at Amazon (Originally $59.95): This will speed up vegetable prep.
  • PriorityChef Large Potato Ricer – $19.93 at Amazon (Originally $32.99): This makes the creamiest mashed potatoes!
  • Zwilling Four Star Eco Paring Knife – $29.95 at Williams Sonoma (Originally $59.95)
  • Joseph Joseph PrecisionPin – $14.99 at Walmart (Originally $19.99): This has different settings for rolling the perfect thickness. 
  • Staub Cast Iron Frying Pan – $99.99 at Zwilling (Originally $189.99): Love this pan!

Other Early Black Friday Sales at Retailers I Love

  • Target: Save up to 50% off holiday decor, including artificial trees and matching pajamas.
  • Williams Sonoma: Thanksgiving cooking must-haves from amazing brands like Staub, Le Creuset, and All-Clad are currently on sale at Williams Sonoma.
  • The Home Depot: Snag deals on everything from large home appliances to Christmas trees and tools. 
  • Walmart: Tech, toys, cooking gear, and so much more are on sale at Walmart’s early Black Friday savings event.
  • Cozy Earth Black Friday Sale: Get up to 35% off the coziest items, like joggers, pajamas, and throw blankets.
  • RugsUSA Thankful Sale: Take up to 25% off a new rug to spruce up your space for hosting holiday dinners with code THANKS. I love this wool one!
  • Wayfair: Furniture and holiday decor are up to 70% off at the Black Friday Sneak Peek sale.

Prices were accurate at time of publishing.

Categories:
